articles.title: Patel faces congressional hearings after missteps in Kirk assassination probe
articles.description:
Patel is also facing broader doubts about whether he can stabilize a federal law enforcement agency fragmented by political fights and internal upheaval.

The post Patel faces congressional hearings after missteps in Kirk assassination probe appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Patel faces congressional hearings due to missteps in the Kirk assassination investigation.
Concerns grow over Patel's ability to stabilize a fragmented federal law enforcement agency.
Boston residents may experience increased scrutiny and changes in federal law enforcement practices.
